author: andschwa
body:
Thanks to @vors, `psl-monad` now has the latest changes from source depot in #39.

I have a successful (and oddly easy) WIP merge, and have the build system updated with the razzle changes. I am working to update our dependencies and stubs to support the new code.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This is my [proposal](https://github.com/PowerShell/psl-monad/pull/7) for the merge.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @daxian-dbw I am having many issues with with the new ETW code.

title: Bring in new source depot changes
